A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt like we spent an hour and a half watching a big ship chase a smaller ship while firing useless shots into the shield of the smaller ship. Little interaction with new worlds\, which is one of my favorite parts of the Star Wars movies. Battles that took place between the Rebels and First Order were mundane and par for the course. That being said\, I'm looking forward to the next installment. Wouldn't spend another 15 dollars to see again in theaters.
